detail.description: AMD-995456-12100224 | The INSERT statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint "FK_pt_ReferralPlans_pt_PatientInfo". The conflict occurred in database "PPMD_CLIENT_CBO_2615_5_0", table "dbo.pt_PatientInfo".
